get.description: This api to fetch searchable fields in a module

This API enables global search and fetches only those modules and fields that the user can access. Each module has a unique ID as follows.:  @1 is Cases,  2 is Solutions, 3 is Contacts, 4 is Accounts, 5 is Feedback,  6 is Tasks,  7 is Products,  8 is Community@.
This API fetches the user ID for the ZUID specified.
